item.title: ðŸ‡²ðŸ‡ª Montenegro
item.description: Serendipity ~ the occurrence and development of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way Montenegro and my whole experience can be very well described by this word. To be honest, before the journey, I have only known the name of the city that I am going to and that “Montenegro is beautiful”. The day before the flight I found out that a passport would be required to enter this country.
